text:
@realDonaldTrump The stock market is not the economy, you lying dunce.

Your stupid attempts to make people think everything’s just peachy will backfire on you. Covid-19 doesn’t give a rat’s ass what your political party is; outbreaks will keep occurring where proper steps aren’t taken.

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela
